name: guestbook-project
description: Ein modernes, vollständig containerisiertes Gästebuch-System mit React Frontend und FastAPI Backend

scripts.test: docker-compose exec frontend npm test && docker-compose exec backend pytest
scripts.lint: docker-compose exec frontend npm run lint && docker-compose exec backend flake8
scripts.format: docker-compose exec frontend npm run format && docker-compose exec backend black .
scripts.backup: docker-compose exec db mysqldump -u guestuser -pguestpw guestbook > backup.sql
scripts.restore: docker-compose exec -T db mysql -u guestuser -pguestpw guestbook < backup.sql
scripts.deploy:portainer: echo 'Verwende docker-compose.portainer.yml für Portainer Stack Deployment'

author: baronblk
